name: ¿Quién eres? Adivina el nombre! - Juego de celebridades
name_original: ¿Quién eres? Adivina el nombre! - Juego de celebridades
description:
———————————————
¿Quién eres?
———————————————
Juego de celebridades y de adivinanzas:
Adivina el nombre!

———————————————
Categorías
———————————————
● Cantantes
● Bandas
● Películas
● Celebridades
● Actores

******************************

———————————————
Overview in English
———————————————
Challenge your celebrity and music knowledge - guess who you are: A pop singer? A sports idol? A celebrity? A band? Or an actor? Guess your mystery identity!

● More than 500 different characters! ●

You like the Post-it on your Forehead Game? Than you'll definitely love this hilarious Party Game! Fun? Guaranteed!

———————————————
TWO LEVELS, TWO GAMES
———————————————
Choose between
● Level one:
Guess your character from your friends clues. How many characters do you get right, before time runs out?
● Level two:
Guess who your are, by asking one yes-no-question after the other

———————————————
MANY CATEGORIES
———————————————
● Singer / Pop Stars
● Bands
● Actors / Actresses
● Celebrities / Historical Figures

———————————————
SETTINGS
———————————————
● Control your iPhone/iPad through movements and gestures, or use the buttons on the touchscreen

———————————————
TIMER
———————————————
● Durations from 1 min to 10 min
